name: Jam City
description: '''Jack Latham''' is a British electronic music producer and DJ who performs under the alias '''Jam City'''. He has been active since 2010 and records on the label [[Night Slugs]]. He has released four full-length albums: 2012's ''[[Classical Curves]]'', 2015's ''[[Dream a Garden]]'', 2020's ''Pillowland'', and 2023's ''EFM''. He has also produced for artists such as [[Kelela]], [[Troye Sivan]], [[Gaika (musician)|Gaika]], and [[Olivia Rodrigo]].
